title: Walking in Paris - The images serve primarily to

content.question: The images of “I too have the sore toe you tend with cotton” (line 19) and “our blue fingers” (line 45) serve primarily to

choices.label: comment on the effects of Paris’s harsh climate
imply that living in Paris is especially dangerous for the speaker
signify a bond between the speaker and Nana
invoke a perception of Nana as a doting caretaker

content.answer: signify a bond between the speaker and Nana

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
